subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Arizona State’s James Harden has become a first-team all-American and top N.B.A. draft prospect despite sporting a grandfatherly beard and a doughy body without a single tattoo.
snippet: Arizona State’s James Harden has become a first-team all-American and top N.B.A. draft prospect despite sporting a grandfatherly beard and a doughy body without a single tattoo.
